name: SiriSlider
summary: SiriSlider is library for iOS apps, offering customizable slider views with dual thumb controls for adjusting minimum and maximum values. Supporting Right-to-Left (RTL) layout, it enhances usability across languages. With seamless integration and extensive customization options, ThumbSlider simplifies slider implementation, empowering developers to deliver polished user experiences.
